title: Spaceman1000$
author: Spaceman1000$
created_time: January 25, 2023, 11:11:58 PMLast edit: January 25, 2023, 11:32:04 PM by Spaceman1000$
content: Facebook and Instagram have restored the accounts of former president Donald Trump.After two years of suspending the social media accounts of the former president of the United States of America Donald trump, today his accounts has been reinstated.In January 2021, he was permanently banned from both sites as a result of his post regarding the disturbances at the US Capitol, he called the thundreds of his supporters that invaded the US capitol complex "patriot ". That didn't resonate well with a lot of American's, because that invasion lead to the death of about four civilians and a police man. So far that, his social media accounts where all suspended, but today what we are seeing in the news is that, his both account for Instagram and Facebook has been reinstated but for his Twitter account, there hasn't been any news on that yet. Though Some people believes his reinstatement is connected to next year's elections, because fingers are already pointed at him to be a strong contestant, so reinstating his accounts will help him spread his campaign tentacles.  So guys what do you think, is his reinstatement connected to the forth coming elections or not?https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-01-25/trump-reinstated-to-facebook-instagram-after-two-year-ban

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Did anyone ever try to cancel their Facebook account. When I tried, they told me, sure it's cancelled. But if you ever want to login again, just enter your password.Is Trump even interested?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Spaceman1000$ on January 25, 2023, 11:11:58 PM So far that, his social media accounts where all suspended, but today what we are seeing in the news is that, his both account for Instagram and Facebook has been reinstated but for his Twitter account, there hasn't been any news on that yet.But Elon Mask unbanned his Twitter account in November last year, or you didn't get the news?Musk lifts Donald Trump's Twitter banHe is just not posting there even after the unbanning, and I believe he won't post on Instagram and Facebook either. The reason could be due to his other social media platform (Truth Social). He can't abandon his own to post in social media platforms that banned him before.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: His Truth social contract limits what he can post on other social media sites so it's probably useless. In terms of his reelection campaign, some of his Truth social posts has been dabbling in the Q-anon stuff. It's in his best interest to stay off social media. MSM doesn't cover his Truth social posts as closely as they did everything else and I'd argue his unhinged Truth posts do nothing beneficial for him even if his staunch supporters like it.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: This is sort of funny to me.  Even the liberal snowflakes with Trump Derangement Syndrome are realizing how fucked up this country has gotten under Biden's watch.  They no longer want to engage in shady censorship as they see where it's taken them.  The evidence is coming out showing how elections have been manipulated in every way possible to get Biden elected.  It has been hard getting those who have been bamboozled with fear to realize that they've been conned, but I think all the people dropping dead from the vaccine, the massive inflation, and the liberals touting how great of a job they're doing while liberal cities turn into scenes out of The Walking Dead has been enough to get them to begin to take action to right their wrongs, which we are seeing here.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Isn't it a thing of shame for someone like Donald Trump getting banned from his social media handles, ones you're a public figure then you need to exercise caution to the things you say or what you do, there's nowhere on Earth any act that involved loss of live will be tolerated except if the conditions warrant for doing such as in the case of war, yet i expected him to quickly deleted the post he made if it was by mistake out of curiosity then and not to leave such because alot of people had made such mistake of its kind and corrected it before the public responded.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Dunamisx on January 26, 2023, 08:40:42 PMIsn't it a thing of shame for someone like Donald Trump getting banned from his social media handles, ones you're a public figure then you need to exercise caution to the things you say or what you do, there's nowhere on Earth any act that involved loss of live will be tolerated except if the conditions warrant for doing such as in the case of war, yet i expected him to quickly deleted the post he made if it was by mistake out of curiosity then and not to leave such because alot of people had made such mistake of its kind and corrected it before the public responded. In the case of war? Biden and Congress are feeding Ukraine. That's a case of war, right? So, what about the war between Biden and Trump campaigning for the presidency? Why is it that Trump got kicked off, and the far more criminally active Biden didn't?

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I read about this recently.I believe it has indeed something to do with the fact Mr.Trump is a presidential candidate and also since his account was unlocked on Twitter, he has not come back to engage there, I do not expect him to go back to Facebook and instagram either. I have got the impression that Mr. Trump still has a strong grudge against social media, the same that led him to start his own, Truth social. The only way he goes back to mainstream social media is whether he needs the boost of attention next year, to engage more of his base.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: If the unlocking of his account is related to his having the highest percentage of winning the presidential seat, then this is pure politics. Zuckerberg must be trying to play it safe by unlocking the account before the time of the election, with the fear that when he eventually wins the seat, he will come back for both social media, which he believes have stepped on his right to freedom of speech. I don't see Trump as someone who will even want to make use of those accounts, for whatever reasons. Unless it will be his campaign managers who will want to use his page to promote him on those social media sites. But for Zuckerberg to unlock both his Instagram and Facebook accounts does not guarantee his social platforms' safety. Let's just watch and see what will happen, before or after the election, about whether he will make use of those accounts or not.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 26, 2023, 01:07:27 PMQuote from: Spaceman1000$ on January 25, 2023, 11:11:58 PM So far that, his social media accounts where all suspended, but today what we are seeing in the news is that, his both account for Instagram and Facebook has been reinstated but for his Twitter account, there hasn't been any news on that yet.But Elon Mask unbanned his Twitter account in November last year, or you didn't get the news?Musk lifts Donald Trump's Twitter banHe is just not posting there even after the unbanning, and I believe he won't post on Instagram and Facebook either. The reason could be due to his other social media platform (Truth Social). He can't abandon his own to post in social media platforms that banned him before.The unique users in Trump's Truth Social has been declining drastically. It reduced from 4.02 million in August to 2.85 million in October last year and currently it has just 1.7 million users. The truth is that most Americans, including his supporters are not using this platform. Donald Trump needs all the attention to push forward his Presidential ambition and he thought he could get it by starting his own social media platform. But it is very clear now that Truth social might not give him the wide audience he needs. Hence, it would not be a surprise to see the ex-president going back to Twitter and other social media platforms. He might claim that Elon Musk has liberated Twitter from the influence of the democrats and use it as the reason for his coming back.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: People want results. Trump isn't giving them results. He couldn't even straighten the election fraud in 2020. What else doesn't he have to offer? You can get more and clearer truth here - http://annavonreitz.com/ - than Trump seems to offer.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Die_empty on January 28, 2023, 05:55:08 PMThe unique users in Trump's Truth Social has been declining drastically. It reduced from 4.02 million in August to 2.85 million in October last year and currently it has just 1.7 million users. The truth is that most Americans, including his supporters are not using this platform. Donald Trump needs all the attention to push forward his Presidential ambition and he thought he could get it by starting his own social media platform. But it is very clear now that Truth social might not give him the wide audience he needs. Hence, it would not be a surprise to see the ex-president going back to Twitter and other social media platforms. He might claim that Elon Musk has liberated Twitter from the influence of the democrats and use it as the reason for his coming back.From a business perspective, he will lose a sizable amount of money, since Truth Social is now his personal business. Deciding to abandon his platform and instead use Twitter and other platforms will make numbers even plummet further because the main reason they are there is because of him. I also believe all the stocks related to truth social will tank if her dear made a move to use the social media platforms that "betrayed' him in the first place.

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 29, 2023, 12:27:17 PMQuote from: Die_empty on January 28, 2023, 05:55:08 PMThe unique users in Trump's Truth Social has been declining drastically. It reduced from 4.02 million in August to 2.85 million in October last year and currently it has just 1.7 million users. The truth is that most Americans, including his supporters are not using this platform. Donald Trump needs all the attention to push forward his Presidential ambition and he thought he could get it by starting his own social media platform. But it is very clear now that Truth social might not give him the wide audience he needs. Hence, it would not be a surprise to see the ex-president going back to Twitter and other social media platforms. He might claim that Elon Musk has liberated Twitter from the influence of the democrats and use it as the reason for his coming back.From a business perspective, he will lose a sizable amount of money, since Truth Social is now his personal business. Deciding to abandon his platform and instead use Twitter and other platforms will make numbers even plummet further because the main reason they are there is because of him. I also believe all the stocks related to truth social will tank if her dear made a move to use the social media platforms that "betrayed' him in the first place.But his main goal for next year is to run for president, and as a billionaire like him, losing a little bit of profit won't be a big problem. Moreover, in return he received the support of the voters and won the election, the trade-off was well worth it. I believe he will soon return to popular social networks to prepare for his election. It can be said that with the huge user disparity between his social network and Twitter or Facebook, he couldn't have a better choice.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Trump has an already established reputable and name that not even the ban of his social media handle is next to nothing for someone like him. It would be a miscarriage of vision should Trump move back to making use of his Twitter account him being a progenitor of Truth social with millions of followers already. This is just a business strategy by musk to regain some influence and attention from the media space that might have  receded due to the Trump account ban.  business Men could be cunning at times.

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 26, 2023, 01:27:10 AMDid anyone ever try to cancel their Facebook account. When I tried, they told me, sure it's cancelled. But if you ever want to login again, just enter your password.Is Trump even interested?In 2020 the Trump campaign spent $113 million in advertising asking for donations.  The boomers donated almost $300 million.  So yeah, he's interested.  Facebook is a gold mine for Trump.  And Trump is a gold mine for Facebook.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: TwitchySeal on January 30, 2023, 04:55:53 AMIn 2020 the Trump campaign spent $113 million in advertising asking for donations.  The boomers donated almost $300 million.  So yeah, he's interested.  Facebook is a gold mine for Trump.  And Trump is a gold mine for Facebook.  After all, they will gonna gain nothing if they continue to restrict his social media accounts and they will gain something when they unbanned it. it might be the right time for them to consider not letting him post anything until the Election if they are truly against him but this time, their decision will put Trump in the upper spot in the next survey once he starts to talk about his plan and way to make their country great again. It was a close election by the way and with the current state of their country after Biden was elected, they consider to give him back a chance again.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.created_time: January 30, 2023, 07:20:33 PMLast edit: January 30, 2023, 07:42:52 PM by Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker link=topic=5436801.msg61655564#msg61655564Did anyone ever try to cancel their Facebook account. When I tried, they told me, sure it's cancelled. But if you ever want to login again, just enter your password.Is Trump even interested?I don't think Trump is interested anymore, you can't just block my account then after how many months you decide to unblock it, I think Trump has moved on from the usefulness of the accounts and has found other means to express him self or other platforms to his audience. The reason we open social media accounts is to express ourselves, so if I can't express myself with a particular social media account then what is the use of that account. If it was me I will never use those account again. So I think Trump don't need those account again. I have been looking a way to block my Facebook account for over a year now but no way, I have tried many times to block my Facebook account but no way. If anyone had an idea please I will be happy to follow your tip.

This can nit happen in my country, just forget our Democracy that many people are using to deprive some persons of there right. This attempt was unacceptable but no one talks and do nothing in the name of politics.

comments.body: From my understanding I even think that these two particular app is owned by one person so I don't understand what many people said to us this that this app is differentiated from different people so boy from me since I've been very fine I thought that is one person that only two social media app
